description:
Once you pop, you can't stop.

Fantastic game with magic stones. Strategic, addictive and challenging fun for everyone.

**************************************************

How to play:

- Tap tow or more blocks with the same color.
- There is no time limit while each stage has target score to proceed to next stage.

**************************************************

Tips on scoring:

1. The more blocks elimination the more scores you get.
Example if you eliminate N blocks once you will get 5*N*N score.

2. The less blocks left at the end of stage the more bonus you will get.
Example if there is N blocks left you will get (2000-N*N*20) bonus.

**************************************************

Magic stones:

1. Swap magic stone will help you swap one block with another.
Usage: Click swap stone button then drag a block and drop on another block.

2. Shake magic stone will help you rearrange current blocks.
Usage: shake you phone.

3. Brush magic stone will help you make a block colorful that will match any other color during elimination.
Usage: click the magic button and tap a block.

**************************************************

Features:

- All available for iPhone, iPod touch or iPad.
- Leaderboard support

**************************************************

Wish you a great fun!
